<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bark and Tendril](/Feats.aspx?ID=1047) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 55 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You wield primal magic. You can cast [_barkskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=20) and [_entangle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=103) as 2nd-level primal innate spells once per day each.
name: Bark and Tendril
